oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Researching the future
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Browning, Helen
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Research methodology and philosophy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The author, a recent Chair of the Soil Association and an organic farmer, examines the relationship between the research community and farmers, and argues for publicly funded, radical 'pioneering research' which will increase the sustainability of organic farming and deliver greater benefits. This will require genuine collaboration between researchers, farmers and the public.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Browning, Helen (2002) Researching the future. Speech at: UK Organic Research 2002 Conference, Organic Centre Wales, Institute of Rural Studies, University of Wales, Aberystwyth, 26-28 March 2002.
